text: There should be way to customize the columns in Listeners in GUI Mode. For example, if I want to add a column (for ex. Response Code) in 'View Results in Table' listener, there is no way to do that.
creator: amit.srpce@gmail.com

text:
GUI load testing being a JMeter Anti-Pattern, I close issue as WONTFIX.

Enhancements will most probably concentrate on HTML report in the future which can be generated at end of load test.
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
